title: Pan Roasted Brussels Sprouts With Bacon
summary: Pan Roasted Brussels Sprouts With Bacon might be just the side dish you are searching for. This gluten free and primal recipe serves 2 and costs $2.58 per serving. One serving contains 484 calories, 18g of protein, and 34g of fat. It can be enjoyed any time, but it is especially good for Christmas. 233 people have made this recipe and would make it again. A mixture of bacon, oregano leaves, butter, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 96%. This score is excellent. Similar recipes are Pan Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Bacon, Italian Seasoned Pan Roasted Garlic Brussels Sprouts, and Roasted Brussels Sprouts {with Bacon}.
